title: Ep 215 | Phil Preaches to Evil Eye, Jep Impresses Tim Tebow, and When Human Beings Are Lost
description:
Phil shares Jesus with a guy they call Evil Eye, and Evil Eye helps Al identify the bullet found near his pool. Jase spots a sandhill crane lost in the fog and ponders what it can teach us about people who lose their way and get off track. Phil shares a verse that underscores just how much God loves us. And the guys discuss censorship, why we need superheroes, the one thing that scares the daylights out of Jep Robertson, meeting Tim Tebow's wife, and what Jep did to impress Tebow.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
